response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects its true worth while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I'm confident you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
